title: ★ The Talk Show Live From WWDC 2025
description: Recorded in front of a live audience at The California Theatre in San Jose Tuesday evening, special guests Joanna Stern and Nilay Patel join me to discuss Apple’s announcements at WWDC 2025.
author: John Gruber
